effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Ice moves by 20%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Ice-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A hold item that
raises the power of
ICE-type moves.

A hold item that
raises the power of
ICE-type moves.

An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A piece of ice that repels heat
and boosts ICE-type moves.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a piece of ice that repels heat
and boosts Ice-type moves.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a piece of ice that repels heat
and boosts Ice-type moves.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a piece of ice that repels heat
and boosts Ice-type moves.

Objet à tenir. Morceau de glace qui
réfléchit la chaleur et monte la
puissance des capacités de type Glace.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a piece of ice that repels heat
and boosts Ice-type moves.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a piece of ice that repels heat
and boosts Ice-type moves.

ねつを　よせつけない　こおり。
もたせると　こおりタイプの
わざの　いりょくが　あがる。

열을 가까이하지 않게 하는 얼음.
지니게 하면 얼음타입
기술의 위력이 올라간다.

Objet à tenir. Un morceau de glace qui réfléchit
la chaleur et augmente la puissance des
capacités de type Glace.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Ein Stück Eis, das Hitze
fernhält und Attacken vom Typ Eis verstärkt.

Debe llevarlo un Pokémon. Aumenta el ingenio en
los concursos.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Pezzo di ghiaccio che respinge il calore
e potenzia le mosse di tipo Ghiaccio.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It’s a piece of ice that repels heat
effects and boosts Ice-type moves.

熱を　よせつけない　氷。
持たせると　こおりタイプの
技の　威力が　あがる。

ねつを　よせつけない　こおり。
もたせると　こおりタイプの
わざの　いりょくが　あがる。

隔絕熱的冰。
攜帶後，冰屬性的
招式威力就會提高。
